name: url-tools
title: URL Tools
description: Quickly encode or decode URL from the clipboard
author: Joshua

commands.name: encodeInput
commands.title: URL Encode From Input
commands.description: Input and get an encoded string, support url encode and base64

commands.name: decodeInput
commands.title: URL Decode From Input
commands.description: Input and get an decoded string, support url decode and base64

commands.name: encode
commands.title: URL Encode
commands.description: Overwrite the clipboard contents with an URL encoded string

commands.name: decode
commands.title: URL Decode
commands.description: Overwrite the clipboard contents with a URL decoded string

commands.name: urlParse
commands.title: URL Parse
commands.description: Input a URL and get the parsed result
